short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zero Two cursor for chrome. New browser experience with custom Zero Two cursor extension. Created for Zero Two anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New browsing experience by using this Zero Two cursor chrome extension. 
 
Zero Two Cursor Extension Features:
1. Give you different Zero Two cursor design for you to replace default cursor.
2. Click on the task bar extension icon located at right hand top corner to open up Zero Two anime cursor setting box.

-------------------
! After installing this extension, refresh the previously opened tab if you want to use it on this page.

! According to the rules of the Chrome Web Store extension cannot work on the store pages and home page.
Please open any other website (for example, google.com) after installing this extension and check how the extension will work on it.

-------------------

If you have any questions about our Zero Two anime cursor extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you.
